tool_description: Geohash is a way to encode a geographic location (latitude and longitude) into a short string of characters, which represents that location with varying levels of precision.
name: Geohash
title: Geohash

api_list.name: geolocation (decode)
geohash (encode)
api_list.description: Encodes geolocation point to geohash with precision 1 to 12 in one request
